title: Is Tadej Poga훾ar Going to Race Paris-Roubaix After All? Watch World Champ Crush Arenberg Cobbles in Surprise Recon
content:
Poga훾ar posts video of himself clattering across the cobbles of the Trouee d'Arenberg to raise speculation of shock 2025 debut at the 'Hell of the North.'
